ptp.config.show_trajectory_desc: Toggle the visibility of projectile trajectories.
ptp.config.trajectory_color_desc: Select the color of the trajectory line.
ptp.config.trajectory_style_desc: Choose the style of the trajectory line.
ptp.config.trajectory_opacity_desc: Set the opacity level of the trajectory line.
ptp.config.outline_color_desc: Select the color for outlining targets.
ptp.config.outline_opacity_desc: Set the opacity level of the outline.
ptp.config.highlight_color_desc: Select the color for highlighting targets.
ptp.config.highlight_opacity_desc: Set the opacity level of the highlight.
ptp.config.enable_offhand_desc: Toggle trajectory visibility for offhand projectiles
TARGET_IS_ENTITY: Only if the target is an entity
ptp.key.toggle: Cycle between the different states of the mod (Enabled/Only if the target is an entity/Disabled)
